| History                 = The Mode Blanks are a Latino gang, that were rivals of the [[Stone Perfs (Earth-616)|Stone Perfs]]. They executed a drive by shooting on a Stone Perfs funeral. One which [[Clint Barton (Earth-616)|Hawkeye]] and [[Barbara Morse (Earth-616)|Mockingbird]] intervened in, saving the lives of the mourners and capturing the gang members.{{r|Avengers Spotlight Vol 1 32}} Hawkeye afterwards interrogated members of the gang who were celebrating the demise of the Stone Perfs, to find out who the Terminizer was.{{r|Avengers Spotlight Vol 1 36}}
